statements: SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, grape_variety FROM wine_preferences WHERE flavor_profile = 'dry';
SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE grape_variety = 'Chardonnay' AND region_name = 'California';
SELECT region_name, flavor_profile FROM wine_preferences WHERE grape_variety LIKE '%Sauvignon%';
SELECT region_name, grape_variety, flavor_profile FROM wine_preferences ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, grape_variety, flavor_profile FROM wine_preferences WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE region_name IN ('Bordeaux', 'Champagne');
SELECT region_name, grape_variety FROM wine_preferences ORDER BY grape_variety DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM wine_preferences;
SELECT AVG(region_id) AS average_region_id, AVG(LENGTH(grape_variety)) AS average_grape_variety_length FROM wine_preferences;
SELECT * FROM wine_regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM wine_regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name FROM wine_regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, grape_variety FROM wine_details WHERE flavor_profile = 'fruity';
SELECT * FROM wine_details WHERE grape_variety = 'Merlot' ORDER BY wine_id ASC;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM wine_regions
SELECT * FROM wine_details WHERE grape_variety='Merlot'
SELECT wine_id, grape_variety, flavor_profile FROM wine_details WHERE region_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM wine_details WHERE grape_variety='Chardonnay' AND flavor_profile='Citrusy'
SELECT region_name, COUNT(wine_id) AS total_wines FROM wine_regions LEFT JOIN wine_details ON wine_regions.region_id = wine_details.region_id GROUP BY region_name
SELECT * FROM wine_regions;
SELECT region_name, country FROM wine_regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT variety_name, color FROM grape_varieties WHERE variety_id > 5;
SELECT profile_name, description FROM flavor_profiles ORDER BY profile_id DESC;
SELECT country, region_name FROM wine_regions ORDER BY country, region_name;
SELECT * FROM wine_regions WHERE country = 'France' ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT variety_name, color FROM grape_varieties WHERE variety_id < 5 ORDER BY color ASC;
SELECT profile_name, description FROM flavor_profiles WHERE profile_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT region_name, country, count(*) FROM wine_regions GROUP BY region_name, country;
SELECT variety_name, color, description FROM grape_varieties WHERE color = 'Red' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM wine_regions;
SELECT region_name, country FROM wine_regions WHERE climate='Cool';
SELECT id, flavor_name, type FROM flavor_profiles ORDER BY flavor_name DESC;
SELECT variety_name, color FROM grape_varieties WHERE color='Red' AND characteristics IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM wine_regions;
SELECT * FROM wine_regions ORDER BY region_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT region_name, country FROM wine_regions WHERE country='France';
SELECT variety_name, color FROM grape_varieties WHERE color='Red' AND characteristics IS NOT NULL;
SELECT flavor_name FROM flavor_profiles WHERE type='Sweet' OR type='Fruity';
SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, region_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM wine_regions;
SELECT region_name FROM wine_regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT wine_name, rating FROM wines JOIN wine_reviews ON wines.wine_id = wine_reviews.wine_id WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT variety_name, region_name FROM grape_varieties JOIN wines ON grape_varieties.variety_id = wines.variety_id JOIN wine_regions ON wines.region_id = wine_regions.region_id;
SELECT * FROM wine_reviews WHERE comments IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM wines ORDER BY wine_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT wine_name, region_id, variety_id FROM wines WHERE variety_id = 2 AND profile_id = 3;
SELECT region_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM wine_regions JOIN wines ON wine_regions.region_id = wines.region_id JOIN wine_reviews ON wines.wine_id = wine_reviews.wine_id GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT wine_name, rating FROM wines JOIN wine_reviews ON wines.wine_id = wine_reviews.wine_id WHERE rating > 9 ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT wine_name, variety_name, profile_name FROM wines JOIN grape_varieties ON wines.variety_id = grape_varieties.variety_id JOIN flavor_profiles ON wines.profile_id = flavor_profiles.profile_id ORDER BY wine_name ASC LIMIT 3;
